testsuite.name: Scenario: Rename the section and page names when creating new lesson

testcase.name: Given I am logged in as the default administrator
testcase.classname: Scenario: Rename the section and page names when creating new lesson

testcase.name: And I am on the Content Repository page of Demonstration Class
testcase.classname: Scenario: Rename the section and page names when creating new lesson

testcase.name: And I choose creating new lesson in "Student Readiness" unit from the main dropdown button
testcase.classname: Scenario: Rename the section and page names when creating new lesson

testcase.name: And Lesson Editor is opened
testcase.classname: Scenario: Rename the section and page names when creating new lesson

testcase.name: When I add new section "Section 1"
testcase.classname: Scenario: Rename the section and page names when creating new lesson

testcase.name: Then a new section "Section 1" appears in the navigation
testcase.classname: Scenario: Rename the section and page names when creating new lesson

testcase.name: When I add new page "Page 1" from the section drop down
testcase.classname: Scenario: Rename the section and page names when creating new lesson

testcase.name: And I add new page "Page 2 as Block" from the section drop down and display blocks as separate pages
testcase.classname: Scenario: Rename the section and page names when creating new lesson

testcase.name: Then a new page "Page 1" appears in the navigation
testcase.classname: Scenario: Rename the section and page names when creating new lesson

testcase.name: And a new page "Page 2 as Block" appears in the navigation and displayed as separate page
testcase.classname: Scenario: Rename the section and page names when creating new lesson

testcase.name: When I rename the name of the section to "Section 1 Renamed"
testcase.classname: Scenario: Rename the section and page names when creating new lesson

testcase.name: Then the new name of the section "Section 1 Renamed" appears in the navigation
testcase.classname: Scenario: Rename the section and page names when creating new lesson

testcase.name: When I rename the name of the page to "Page 1 Renamed"
testcase.classname: Scenario: Rename the section and page names when creating new lesson

testcase.name: Then the new name of the page "Page 1 Renamed" appears in the navigation
testcase.classname: Scenario: Rename the section and page names when creating new lesson
